data.caption: Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended On 31St December, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30, 33 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith Un-Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended on December 31, 2021, as approved by the Board in its meeting held on 11.02.2022.

This is for your record please,

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for OUTCOME OF BOARD MEETING HELD ON 11.02.2022
data.news_body: The Board of Directors in their meeting held on 11.02.2022 have approved the unaudited financial results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended 31.12.2021 in terms of Regulation 33 of SEBI(LODR) Regulations, 2015 (Copy of the Financial Results and Limited Review Report are enclosed)
